DataElement.preferredName: Tobacco Use How Old When First Smoked a Cigarette Age Year Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value that represents how old a person was when they first smoked a cigarette, including even one or two puffs.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Tobacco Use How Old When First Smoked a Cigarette
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Use of tobacco in any form i.e. smoking, chewing or sniffing._A question about how old an individual was when they first smoked a cigarette.

Concepts.definition: Use of tobacco in any form, e.g., smoking, chewing or sniffing.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: DCP-specific CDE based on C-TUQ Measure. Use CDE 5285751 instead if using this measure. 4/18/17   ST - edit DEC just ot set date modified - fix will be in CDE Browser 5.3.1 - DW

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days.:To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.

Concepts.definition: A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.
Determining the number or amount of something.

ReferenceDocuments.description: How old were you when you first smoked a cigarette (even one or two puffs)?  _______ Years old

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP Instruction
ReferenceDocuments.description: Enter a whole number (i.e. "4") only. Do not enter a range or fraction.
